flavorText:
"Vengeance is the echo of the victim's own crime."
—Grensch, merrow cutthroat

foreignData.flavorText: „Vergeltung ist das Echo der eigenen Verbrechen des Opfers." —Grensch, Merrow-Meuchler
foreignData.name: Erinnerungsplünderung
foreignData.text: Du kannst eine Spontanzauber- oder Hexereikarte deiner Wahl aus dem Friedhof eines Gegners spielen, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.

foreignData.flavorText: "La venganza es el eco del crimen de la misma víctima." —Grensch, degollador merrow
foreignData.name: Saquear la memoria
foreignData.text: Puedes jugar la carta de instantáneo o de conjuro objetivo del cementerio de un oponente sin pagar su coste de maná.

foreignData.flavorText: « La vengeance est l'écho du propre crime de la victime. » —Grensch, surineur suire
foreignData.name: Saccagement de mémoire
foreignData.text: Vous pouvez jouer la carte d'éphémère ou de rituel ciblée dans le cimetière d'un adversaire sans payer son coût de mana.

foreignData.flavorText: "La vendetta non è che un'eco del crimine della stessa vittima." —Grensch, tagliagole merrow
foreignData.name: Furto di Memoria
foreignData.text: Puoi giocare una carta istantaneo o stregoneria bersaglio dal cimitero di un avversario senza pagare il suo costo di mana.

foreignData.flavorText: 「復讐ってのは犠牲者の罪の照り返しさ。」 ――メロウの殺し屋、グレンシュ
foreignData.name: 記憶の略取
foreignData.text: いずれかの対戦相手の墓地にある、インスタント・カード１枚かソーサリー・カード１枚を対象とする。あなたはそれを、それのマナ・コストを支払うことなくプレイしてもよい。

foreignData.flavorText: "A vingança é o eco do crime da própria vítima." — Grensch, degolador sirenídeo
foreignData.name: Saquear Memória
foreignData.text: Você pode jogar o card de mágica instantânea ou feitiço alvo no cemitério de um oponente sem pagar seu custo de mana.

foreignData.flavorText: «Месть это лишь эхо преступления самой жертвы». — Гренч, мерроу-головорез
foreignData.name: Хищение Памяти
foreignData.text: Вы можете разыграть находящуюся на кладбище оппонента целевую карту мгновенного заклинания или волшебства без уплаты ее мана-стоимости.

foreignData.flavorText: 「复仇是受害者自身罪恶的回响。」 ～美洛割喉手格兰许
foreignData.name: 记忆劫夺
foreignData.text: 你可以使用在对手坟墓场中的目标瞬间或法术牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

name: Memory Plunder
originalText: You may play target instant or sorcery card in an opponent's graveyard without paying its mana cost.

rulings.text: If you want to cast the card, you cast it as part of the resolution of Memory Plunder. Timing restrictions based on the card's type are ignored if it's a sorcery. Other casting restrictions are not (such as “Cast [this card] only during combat”).
If you are unable to cast the card (there are no legal targets for the spell, for example), nothing happens when Memory Plunder resolves, and the card remains in its owner's graveyard.
If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can't pay any alternative costs. On the other hand, if the card has additional costs (such as conspire), you may pay those.

text: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard without paying its mana cost.
